class DashboardBase(figure=None, figure_config=None, figure_class=<class 'geospacelab.visualization.mpl._base.FigureBase'>, **kwargs)

A dashboard is a collection of panels in a figure or GeospaceLab canvas. The class inherits from DataHub

Parameters

  • canvas (Instance of GeospaceLab Canvas.) – The canvas that the dashboad will be placed.

  • panels (dict, default: {}, the keys are integers starting from 1 if not specified.) – A collection of the panels that are placed in the dashboard.

  • extra_axes (dict, default: {}.) – A collection of the axes additionally appended to the dashboard.

  • gs –

set_layout(num_rows=None, num_cols=None, **kwargs)

Set the layout of the dashboard in a canvas using matplotlib GridSpec.

Parameters

  • num_rows (int.) – The number of rows of the grid.

  • num_cols (int.) – The number of columns of the grid.

  • kwargs – Optional keyword arguments used in matplotlib GridSpec.

add_panel(row_ind=None, col_ind=None, index=None, label=None, panel_class=None, **kwargs)

Add a panel.

Parameters

  • row_ind (int or list.) – The row indices (i or [i, j]) of the panel in the dashboard grid.

  • col_ind (int or list.) – The column indices of the panel in the dashboard grid.

  • index (int or str.) – The panel index as a key in self.panels.

  • label (str) – The panel label

  • panel_class (Subclass of Panel) – If None, use the default Panel class.

  • kwargs – Optional keyword arguments to create a Panel instance.

Returns

index

remove_panel(index)

Remove a panel

Parameters

index (int or str.) – The panel index.

static get_line_collection(x, y, z, linewidth=3, vmin=None, vmax=None, norm='linear', cmap='jet', **kwargs)

Create a set of line segments and a line collection, see also: https://matplotlib.org/2.0.2/examples/pylab_examples/multicolored_line.html

Parameters

  • z (x, y,) – The line points (x, y) with the colored z values.

  • cmap (str or matplotlib.colors.Colormap, default: 'jet'.) – The color map for the plot.

  • kwargs – Other optional keyword arguments forwarded to LineCollection.

Returns

The line collection instance.
